notes: The channeling must succeed to get a Bounty Rune.
abilities.description: Channel for 1 second. Always finds a Bounty Rune!

name: Pirate Hat
description: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.
tips: Since the Pirate Hat can only be obtained past the 60th minute mark, the runes will be worth at least 160 gold per hero.
Best shared with heroes with chance-based modifiers such as bash or critical strike hit.
